other_title: Angel la niña de las flores (Spanish)
El misterio de la flor magica (Spanish)
Le Tour du monde de Lydie (French)
Lulu, et le mystère de la fleur magique (French)
Lulu, la chica de las flores (Spanish)
plot: The King of the Flower Planet is dying, but his heir can't take up the throne until the legendary Seven Color Flower, symbol of the King's power, is found. The Angels Cateau and Noveau are sent to Earth to find the Flower Girl, a young female who descends from both humans and Flower Angels (who once inhabited Earth, long ago) - and they find Lunlun in France. They convince her to go in a long journey to find the Flower - she'll know the good and bad sides of humans and Flower Angels (incarnated in the ambitious Togenishia and her sidekick Boris), and will fall in love with Serge Flora, a man who holds a great secret.
opening_theme: "Hana no Ko Lunlun" (花の子ルンルン) by Mitsuko Horie, The Chirps
"Hana no Ko Lunlun" by Mitsuko Horie
ending_theme: "Onna no Kotte" (女の子って) by Asei Kobayashi, Yuuko Inomata
insert_song: "Koi no Hana Uranai" (恋の花占い) by Mitsuko Horie
"Lilac no Hanakotoba" (ライラックの花言葉) by Mitsuko Horie, Kourogi '73
